Sentece: This study executed the human albumin-fusion technology, a simple and flexible approach to extend the serum circulating half-life of cIFN, because human serum albumin (HSA) has long circulating half-life (19 days) and very minute immunological activities.
Title: Production of potent long-lasting consensus interferon using albumin fusion technology in Pichia pastoris expression system.
Name: Interferon alfacon-1

Sentece: The apparent clearance (dose(sc)/AUC) decreased from 150 mL/h/kg for CIFN to 19.0-45.5 mL/h/kg for PEG-CIFNs.
Title: Pharmacokinetic properties of a 40 kDa branched polyethylene glycol-modified form of consensus interferon-alpha (PEG-CIFN) in rhesus monkeys.
Name: Interferon alfacon-1
